name: Deserted Alone
description:
“Okay James, I’m at the place. I’m sorry I should’ve come earlier, hang in there buddy, I will find you, and we will leave this place together......” Deserted alone is a first person exploration game about finding a missing person, James. After building up the fortitude to find your friend, you decide to go to his last known location. You must scour the place for clues about your friend. But beware! You may be accompanied by mysterious creatures in the forest. Do you have what it takes to figure out what happened to your friend? Follow my twitter handle for my new projects -  https://twitter.com/IssacGameDev
Use WASD to move Use the Mouse to look around and press left mouse button to interact Hold Shift to run Use the Spacebar to jump
